intro: Three score-driven classics from the Raiden Fighters series return alongside modern features and remix music!
description:
Three legendary arcade titles from SEIBU KAIHATSU's Raiden Fighters series return, revived from the depths of time.

Choose between the Japanese version and a hardcore International version!

Enjoy convenient features like rapid-fire button configuration, Practice Mode, and a restart function. 

Great for both first-time players and those returning to 2D shooting games after a long break!

The remix soundtrack includes 30 tracks drawn from the stage and boss music from each title.

Enjoy the music on the sound player, and assign music to each stage just as you like with a mode.

Customize the experience to your liking and discover a new world of Raiden Fighters!

Participating Artists: SOSHI HOSOI/KAZUHIRO TSURUKUBO/YUKI ARAI

Check out the wallpaper customization, an authentic arcade-style CRT filter, and Vertical Screen Mode (monitor rotation) that deliver a vivid sense of presence that goes beyond the arcade experience.

Play the reborn Raiden Fighters in its bold new form to your heart's content!

■ Contents (Choose between the Japanese/International Version)
RAIDEN FIGHTERS
RAIDEN FIGHTERS 2
RAIDEN FIGHTERS JET
